department.ch: 永續與綠能科技研究學院
department.en: Graduate College of Sustainability and Green Energy

goal.ch: 製造聯網技術是工業4.0的基礎架構，目標是建立人、機、料、法、環之間的資訊傳遞聯結，需要橫跨機、電、軟、資等工程科技與工程管理等相關知識。由於需要跨越及聯結多個領域，各領域間的知識門檻在實務上造成業者與合作夥伴難以充分整合人、機、料、法、環之間的資訊。這門課將從智慧機械出發，完成製造聯網實作，並以團隊方式完成一個實務上的製造聯網專題。本課程預期學生可以獲得成效包含：(1)工業物聯網技術與觀念。(2)工廠聯網技術與觀念。(3)工業聯網的實作經驗與成果。實作專題包含：(1) 呈現工廠資訊的SCADA(2) 雲端計算(3) 結合雲端與邊緣運算的機器學習維運(MLOps)
goal.en: “Manufacturing networking technologies are the infrastructure of Industry 4.0. The goal is to establish information transfer among human beings, machines, materials, approaches, and the environment by the integration of cross-field knowledge, including machinery, electricity, software, and information. However, the knowledge barriers between different fields makes it difficult for manufacturers and their partners to fully integrate information among human beings, machines, materials, approaches, and environment. In this course, students will set up the IoT interface of smart machines, integrate factory devices into manufacturing network, and complete a term project that a group co-work to achieve practical tasks. Students in this course can learn an introductory knowledge of manufacturing network technologies and will be coordinators in organizing information system integration in the future. The knowledge for students in this course includes (1) Technologies for Industrial IoT and (2) Technologies for Manufacturing networks. (3) Experiences and achievement on manufacturing networks.“The Problem-based Learning (PBL) projects include:(1) SCADA; (2) Cloud Computing; (3) MLOps

outline.ch:
*113學年第一學期則以英文授課*
學生應自備電腦，課程會進行授課及實作演練
第一部分：使用物聯網技術整合生產系統
I-1: 工業資訊系統/基礎Python
I-2: OPC UA和SCADA的介紹/OPC UA伺服器
I-3: 資訊模型/Ignition SCADA
I-4: 資料庫。SQL和NoSQL / SQL
I-5: 資產管理外殼和微型服務/Web API伺服器
(第一次期中測試)
第二部分：網宇實體系統
II-1: 狀態監測/設置你的平臺（包括電機、arduino、jeston-nano、加速器和其他感測器）和Node-RED
II-2: 使用機器/深度學習進行診斷/分類
II-3: 使用機器/深度學習進行剩餘壽命預測/回歸
II-4: 數位雙胞胎框架/開發你的雲端-邊緣應用(第二次中期測試)
第三部分：基於實務問題的學習專案。
outline.en:
* Lecture in English in Sep - Dec 2024.*
Students must prepare a personal computer or laptop.
Lecture and Practice in class
Part I: Production System Integration using IoT Technologies
I-1: IIndustrial Information System / Basic Python
I-2: Introduction of OPC UA and SCADA / OPC UA Server
I-3: Information Model  / Ignition SCADA
I-4: Databases: SQL ＆ NoSQL / SQL
I-5: Asset Administration Shell and microservice / Web API Server
(First mid-term test)
Part II: Cyber-Physical System
II-1: Condition Monitoring / Setup your platform (with motor, Arduino, Jetson-nano, accelerator, and other sensors) and Node-RED
II-2: Diagnosis / Classification using Machine/Deep Learning
II-3: Residual Life Prediction / Regression using Machine/Deep Learning
II-4: Digital Twins Framework / Deveop your cloud-edge application
(Second mid-term test)
Part III: Problem-based Learning Project.
